metadata.title: CVE-2023-3979 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from10.6 before 16.2.8, all versions starting from 16.3 before 16.3.5, allversions starting from 16.4 before 16.4.1. It was possible that upstreammembers to collaborate with you on your branch get permission to write tothe merge requestâ€™s source branch.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
